Psalms__125.1: When the lord brought back the captivity of Sion, we became like men comforted.
Psalms__125.2: Then was our mouth filled with gladness; and our tongue with joy. Then shall they say among the Gentiles: The Lord hath done great things for them.
Psalms__125.3: The Lord hath done great things for us: we are become joyful.
Psalms__125.4: Turn again our captivity, O Lord, as a stream in the south.
Psalms__125.5: They that sow in tears shall reap in joy.
Psalms__125.6: Going they went and wept, casting their seeds.
Psalms__125.7: But coming they shall come with joyfulness, carrying their sheaves.
